title: Which Bollywood movie character would you want to be in real life and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dia ( Kareena Kapoor) from Gori tere pyar mein. Dia - A Social Worker. Her Energetic and being rooted to the principles of her life is the most inspiring thing. She wasn't fake and never went behind the guy (Shriram - Imran khan) whom she loved too . Because he didn't value her thoughts and criticized her attitude and her policies. She was woman with high morals and respected herself and her decisions. Her simplicity and down to earth character was most inspiring. All her life she wanted to live as social worker . And Kareena Kapoor did justice to the role💯

Kabir thapar(Ranbir Kapoor) from Yeh jawani hai dewaani  One of my all time favorite movie… I like the character of thapar because He will value friendship(remember the scene when Ranbir asks aditya to take money of 25L that he saved) He had a goal and strive to achieve it( to travel some places like Paris etc) He was talkative( which I am not) He left his career and goal for the sake of love of his life(May not happen in real life) Charming,energetic,flirty, encouraging,selfish… What not I like that character and I became fan of Ranbir from this movie….
